nodes.text: The Hutt Hour was a talk show on the radio station BSO 401.72 that was hosted by the Hutt Hiro. It was played by BSO 401.72 host Palob Godalhi and broadcast in certain areas of Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu during the war between the First Order and the Resistance.
The Hutt Hour was first created for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019.
